jobs.headline: My toilet won't flush
jobs.description: There is a problem with my toilet and I need someone to fix it.

jobs.headline: Leaky tap needs fixing
jobs.description: The tap in my kitchen is dripping all of the time, please fix it.

jobs.headline: Rewire a house
jobs.description: My house is in need of rewiring as the electrics are very old and making a buzzing sound whenever I turn on an appliance. Urgent.

jobs.headline: Put up a shelf
jobs.description: I need a shelf putting up in my office. I have the shelf, brackets, and screws, but I don't know what I'm doing with DIY. Please help!

jobs.headline: Need a new electricity supplier
jobs.description: My electricity supplier are ripping me off, please get in touch if you can beat the Flexible tariff of British Gas

jobs.headline: Wire in a new thermostat
jobs.description: I have purchased a new smart thermostat and it needs wiring in.
